21238909a44b.title: Been enjoying your work as of late, Shaunta and agree with most of this.

paragraphs.name: 20d1
paragraphs.text: Been enjoying your work as of late, Shaunta and agree with most of this. Our company straight abandoned our self-hosted blog for Medium when we ran an experiment. I started posting the blogs I had written there on Medium, and they started taking off. Once I hit a few Top 20 with the articles I had written we looked at our traffic and were blown away…

989d3b0260fd.title: I’d love to hear more about that. What makes you think not?

paragraphs.name: 4f59
paragraphs.text: I’d love to hear more about that. What makes you think not?

Way to go! You are so inspiring, Shaunta. Your consistency is remarkable! I’ve recently heard that crossposting can be bad for your article rankings. If confuses google to see 2 same titles on 2 different platforms. Do you crosspost? Do you recommend it? Thank you!

paragraphs.name: bbdc
paragraphs.text: Great writing Shaunta!… got a question: “why would I post my blog on medium where my prospect can get distracted by other writings and miss out on buying a service contract for me on my website??

1ea1a337c5b2.title: I am not a writer in any way.

paragraphs.name: d9a8
paragraphs.text: I am not a writer in any way. However I find your posts reeealy interesting. When I read the title in my feed I open it and later I realize it’s one of your posts… good stuff

bfeb9a4d6f9a.title: When I read the headline, I nodded in agreement.

paragraphs.name: de34
paragraphs.text: When I read the headline, I nodded in agreement. I’m perfectly prepared to believe that blogging is going the way of Blockbuster Video. But I find it impossible to believe that email lists could be the new anything.

a6b37423cc36.title: Jeremy Hildreth, you and I both should probably take a closer look at this.

paragraphs.name: 779b
paragraphs.text: Jeremy Hildreth, you and I both should probably take a closer look at this.

b26f1a828eb1.title: An interesting focus on volume of traffic.

paragraphs.name: 24c1
paragraphs.text: An interesting focus on volume of traffic. What is the value of that traffic? For a hobbyist wanting to make a high pinball score (pageviews) I can see your angle. Building a brand and making that traffic valuable is a whole other thing.

virtuals.subtitle: I’ve written quite a few posts on my blog already but I’m looking at this experiment as publishing those posts as new and improved drafts…

paragraphs.text: I’ve written quite a few posts on my blog already but I’m looking at this experiment as publishing those posts as new and improved drafts that include updates on Medium instead.

7c115325fa9.title: Could you do another blog post specifically about how you use your ConvertKit email list and…

paragraphs.name: fac4
paragraphs.text: Could you do another blog post specifically about how you use your ConvertKit email list and integrate it with your Medium blog here? Also, how does ConvertKit work better with bloggers than say, Constant Contact, as an income generator? Thanks!

6b479178bcfe.title: Yes. This is true while Medium exists in its present form: i.e.

paragraphs.name: 1bfc
paragraphs.text: Yes. This is true while Medium exists in its present form: i.e. until its investors get greedy and start changing the terms and conditions or the Medium project crashes and burns.
